channel.title: Non working L output on new board
channel.description:
Hi. I received my new Core board, and after installing everything on a Win7 system it is working, but I get no sound from the Left output. I thought it could be related to the tricky thing with drivers on Win7, so I installed it on my laptop, quite new, running Win10. I get the same: every patch from the library works ok, but there´s no sound in the L out. As every patch has cables into both L & R output, it cannot be patch related. The little green vumeter peaks on both channel.
Is it a defective card? What should I do?
thanks in advance

item.title: Non working L output on new board
item.dc:creator: @jaimun jaimun
item.description:
@jaimun wrote:

Thank you so much, I was getting crazy with this!
No, I wasn't aware of it... it seemed L &R connectors.

I have plenty of Insert cables back from the old pre-virtual days...

Working like a charm now.

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Non working L output on new board

item.title: Non working L output on new board
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

are you aware of the fact that one connector is a stereo input and the other a stereo output? so you will need a stereo to two mono cable to connect to a mixing desk etc. usually an insert cable works just fine

Read full topic
item.source: Non working L output on new board
